activation.ReallyYourEmail: Ṣe eyi gan ni adirẹsi imeeli rẹ, {{1}}? Ti o ba jẹ bẹ, tẹ ibi lati ṣeto ọrọ igbaniwọle rẹ ati mu akọọlẹ rẹ ṣiṣẹ.

LinkToUnsubscribe: Eyi ni ọna asopọ kan lati yọkuro ti o ko ba fẹ gba awọn imeeli diẹ sii.

charge.HasBeenCharged: Hey, eyi jẹ lati jẹ ki o mọ pe {{1}} ti gba owo {{1000} fun {{3}} nipasẹ {{4}}

charged.HavePaid: Hey {{999}, eyi jẹ ijẹrisi iyara kan pe o ti san {{2}} ni aṣeyọri fun {{4}} fun {{4}}

resend.YouAreReceiving: O n gba imeeli yii nitori ẹnikan ti tẹ adirẹsi imeeli rẹ sii o si tẹ “gbagbe ọrọ igbaniwọle”. Ti kii ṣe iwọ, nìkan foju si ifiranṣẹ yii.
resend.Reset: Lati tun gbolohun ọrọ igbaniwọle rẹ to, tẹ {{1}}

subscription.YouHaveStarted: Hey {{1}}, o ti bẹrẹ ṣiṣe alabapin rẹ si {{2}} pẹlu {{3}} ni {{4}} fun {{5}} osu.
subscription.HasStarted: Eyi jẹ lati jẹ ki o mọ {{1}}, ti bẹrẹ ṣiṣe alabapin wọn si {1000}} pẹlu {{3}} ni {{4}} fun {{5}} osu.
